content.raw:
I'm happy with this. I'm not that familiar with PEP8, so I'll leave it to @cbillington to confirm your editor is actually conforming to PEP8 (which I'm sure it is).

The only odd thing I noticed was the 2 extra blank lines (116-117). It seems to have separated out the comment from the function. I assume that's maybe because you're supposed to do these as a multiline docstring...yep, looks like you should so it [like so](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/#documentation-strings). Could you update that and move the comments above the `int_to_enum` function into a docstring inside the function so it remains attached to the function?

The only odd thing I noticed was the 2 extra blank lines (116-117). It seems to have separated out the comment from the function.
